works.description:
The whole article "Job or business:  
Advantages and disadvantages" has been copied by the infringing blog  
starting with the text "ndia is a land of diversity and there are lot of  

ways where and how we can earn. It can be in form of a job or we can do  
some sort of business to ear our livelihood. It is common process that a  

person who is not in studies always tends to do a business or a person who
 
has a background of business family always inclined towards business only.
 
But the people who are in family where all are doing jobs then it becomes 

very difficult for them to go in business as there is very insecurity if  

they opt for business.
Job process thinking
There are many study options in India and as the economy is growing so as 

the job options. Most of the students here when doing the studies always  

have in mind to do the jobs after getting graduation. No body thinks to  
start up any business as their is lot of risk involved in starting up of  

business and there is lot of investment required too. Therefore a middle  

class person always think about to get a regular fixed source of earning  

which can be fulfilled by job only.
After getting the degrees of diplomas when a person starts doing a job
then  
he bound s himself to a place where he do the fix work for a fixed salary.
 
Here his whole life keep on rotating between home and job. Jobs are very  

tedious these days where apart from the fixed hours you need to put more
to  
get some good ranking in the appraisals." and continuing till the end
